SQLTransientException(java.lang.Throwabl.Description: Constructs a SQLTransientException object with a given cause. The SQLState is initialized to null and the vendor code is initialized to 0. The reason is initialized to null if cause==null or to cause.toString() if cause!=null.

ClassDesc: The subclass of @B_java#sql#SQLException_E@ is thrown in situations where a previoulsy failed operation might be able to succeed when the operation is retried without any intervention by application-level functionality.
